SUMMARY: Over 10+ years of experience in SAP ABAP/4, ECC, BW, BODS and HANA systems. Working knowledge across multiple SAP systems is my strength.

Technical expertise includes Data Dictionary Objects, Dialog programming, ALV Reports, Data Migration Techniques, BAPI, Scripts, Smart forms, User exits, BADI, WebDynpro for ABAP, IDOC, ALE & EDI, HR ABAP, FIORI App Development.
Comprehensive experience in handling the full life cycle implementation of SAP ERP and providing Business Solutions as a developer and architect
Escalation handling (internal and external) while conducting the team meetings and periodic reviews with Client team
Upgrade, Development and Designing skills in ABAP with strong knowledge in FI, SD, MM, WM, IM and APO Modules
Instrumental in establishing handshake between functional requirements and their interaction with SAP technology by providing technical solution
Good knowledge on EHP upgrades using Software Update Manager (SUM tool) in ECC 6.0 in Linux and Oracle database
Business process know - how in FI-CO, SD, MM, VMS, PP, WM & APO Modules
Worked on Data Dictionary objects, Reports (Classical and Interactive), ALV Reports (Object Oriented, Classical and Interactive)
Expertise in Dialog programming. Implemented custom Tcodes to facilitate customer Business Processes, implemented Screen enhancements using User-Exits and BADI’s
Proficient in generation of BDC programs using batch input (session), Call transaction and good knowledge in Data Migration tools (LSMW)
Good knowledge in creation of ABAP Data flows for Batch jobs and troubleshooting Job failures
OSS note implementations, SAP Scripts, Smart Forms, Enhancement Framework, SAP-WORKFLOW
Extensively worked with VOFM routines and implemented BTE’s
Extensively worked with User-Exits from SD module
Implemented various Customer-Exits for Supply Chain Execution, IDOC extensions
Worked on Multiple use BADI’s with Filters and implemented Screen Enhancement using BADI
Worked with BAPI’s and BAPI Extension for custom fields
Implemented multiple RFC’s and worked with sRFC, tRFC, qRFC, parallel processing with aRFC
Extensively worked on interfacing RF guns and Labels for warehouse operations
Strong understanding of SAP Internet Transaction Server and ITS implementation Models
Worked on designing business forms using SAP Scripts and Smart forms
Expertise in integrating ECC system with heterogeneous systems by using ALE
Configured ALE partner profiles and implemented multiple IDOC extensions, custom IDOC types
Deep expertise in setting up Inbound/Outbound IDOC interfaces and troubleshoot IDOC failures
Good understanding and working knowledge in Object oriented concepts and issues
Knowledge in Adobe forms (Adobe Life cycle management), SAP-Webdynpro issues
Involved in gathering reporting requirements from Business users and Functional documents in form of TD’s
Responsible for handling the Transport mechanism for different landscapes of the Systems

Extensively worked on Performance tuning. Analyzing indexes, DB Hints, Efficient Joins, internal table processing, analyzing AS performance (SAT), SQL performance (ST05). Worked with Code Inspector and created Check Variants.
Designed ER-Diagrams in VISIO and Business and Functional architecture Diagrams
Handled various UI elements - button, radio buttons, business graphics, group, image, lead selection for tables, roadmap, viewcontainerUIelement, cell variants, and table popin etc.
Experienced in developing Webdynpro Applications using Service Call, Supply Function, ALV Reports, Table and Navigations.
Extensively worked with dynamic views and Help options like OVS, Freely programming.
Good knowledge in classes and interfaces of the view, context and window.
Good Experience in enhancing standard WebDynpro components.
Experience in Online interactive forms.
Configured FPM(Floor Plan Manager) component and handled OIF & GAF.
Created iViews to integrate Webdynpro components to Portal.
Good Working and troubleshooting knowledge in ABAP Development for BW
Extensively involved in BW Modeling writing Variable Customer Exits - by using the Enhancement RSR00001 - Function Exit - EXIT SAPLRRS0 001 - (Including I STEP=2)
Involved in customizing the Data Source / Extractors by using the enhancement RSAP0001 - by using different function exits / components - EXIT SAPLRSAP 001 - EXIT SAPLRSAP 002 - EXIT SAPLRSAP 003
Involved in customizing the process chains by using the ABAP/4 program process types

Involved in implementing Update routines, Transfer Routines, Start Routines, End Routines and Expert Routines in order to implement the Business rules and also performed currency translation at the transformations by using the function modules CONVERT TO FOREIGN CURRENCY, maintaining the exchange rates in TCURR tables in SAP BI by replicating all the Global setting for ECC 6.0
Extensively Involved in extracting the data from SAP R/3 4.6 and ECC 6.0
Debugging of the BW Routines
Working in SAP ABAP Native SQL ADBC API’s for fetching the data from HANA as secondary database connection
Implemented Stored procedures using HANA SQLScript
Created Sequences, Tables, views using Content Node

Analyzed queries using Plan Visualization/Explain Plan
Implemented Dynamic Analytic Privileges using Stored Procedure

Actively involved in cutover activities during Roll-outs, Go-Live and Year-End activities

Created multiple reports for batch file processing and extensively created complex ABAP jobs, events

Created an Interactive Report for displaying vendor information. Based on the selection made, the Corresponding Vendor Bank Details are listed such that the line selected in the basic list was visible along with the secondary list
Created a Classical report to display PO, PO Item, Status, change item data, Material Number, PO Quantity, Order Unit and Price
Developed a custom ALV grid report using function modules to display Material Number and Material Text in MM
Created BDC for uploading Customer master data, quotation, sales order, billing and other data related to enquiry to SAP system from the legacy system using Session method
Developed ALV report to display the open Sales Orders/ Closed Sales Orders and the detailsincluding the additional information like partner data and load carrier and shipment information.
Created material wise stock overview report for drill down analysis using ALV Hierarchical Display providing details of provider, price, quantity, dates etc.
Created an interactive list displaying sales orders and line items, which needed to be delivered by certain date.
Material Master Upload and Update the Material Master with different view data using transaction MM41 and MM42 for both single and generic material.
Worked with BAPI PO CHANGE for changing the PO with updated G/L Account derived by the logic based Material & Vendor.

Modified Outbound Delivery Interface using Custom IDoc (copy DELVRY03) including custom segments which include required for different legacy systems. Copy Process Code DELV (IDOC OUTPUT DELVRY) and IDocs to be send by VL71.
Sending Material IDoc at the creation and change of a material using change pointer technique.

Custom IDoc created by copying MATMAS03 for new custom segments to pass data, which is not available in standard segments. Configuration for change pointer done for new custom IDoc and new ustom FM, which is copy of MASTERIDOC CREATE SMD MATMAS.
Use the user exit V56FCOPY for copying delivery data.
Implemented User exit to make Order reason field mandatory in Sales Order.
Added custom Field in transaction MIGO by using MB MIGO BADI.
Worked on BADI for validating the fields in the Fast Entry Screen for creating sales order (BADI SD SALES ITEM and BADI SD SALES BASIC).

Worked on BADI Implementations for SD module, BADI SD SALES, BADI SD SALES ITEM. The method ITEM CHECK checks whether the line item has a hazardous material and displays a pop up message if there is a hazardous material.
Developed Conversion programs to create Purchase orders & Contract’s Mass upload in SAP from IBIS system using BAPIs like BAPI SALESORDER CREATEFROMDAT1 & BAPI CONTRACT CREATEFROMDATA.
Developed LSMW programs to load purchase orders transaction data using Batch/Direct Input method.
Developed LSMW program for uploading Customer Master & purchasing info records into sap system using Batch Input recording method.
Worked on Change Pointers to modify the data in both Sender and Receiver Systems regarding Material and Vendor Details.
Developed Smart forms and associated driver programs for each spec to list the Spec data and converted them to PDF format.
Modified Smart form MEDRUCK and program SAPFM06P to include logo, contact person detailslike the email id of the buyer etc.
Customize F110 PRENUM CHECK (Check printing) according to client requirements and formats.

Designed and coded a BDC program for Sales Orders that updated records in the sales order screen or created new sales orders depending on the source data file from external systems using VA01 and VA02 transactions

Used EDI process to enable the client to exchange documents with the business partners. Setup the ALE. Worked with RFC destination and Ports, created Partner Profiles, Distribution Model & message type. Also configured the Inbound & Outbound process for EDI documents such as Sales Orders.
Filtered IDOCS, worked with Port Definition, Partner Profile in the process
Data migration for Vendor Master Data from legacy system to SAP system using LSMW
Worked on User exits to predefine Sold-to party in Sales document for Sales & Distribution.
Developed an RFC to know the all storage locations with their stock details for materials.

Created a Smart form to display Customer Info, Company info & Company Logo along with Item Number, Material Number, Description, Order Quantity, and Total Price. Also created custom Smart styles in the process.
